com.pump.plaf

Class DecoratedTreeUI.TreeDecoration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.plaf.DecoratedTreeUI.TreeDecoration
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DecoratedTreeUI.BasicTreeDecoration, DecoratedTreeUI.RepaintingTreeDecoration
    Enclosing class:
    DecoratedTreeUI

    public abstract static class DecoratedTreeUI.TreeDecoration
extends java.lang.Object
    A TreeDecoration is an icon that is painted on the rightmost edge of the tree UI. This icon is not technically associated with a JComponent, but the DecoratedTreeUI will trigger ActionEvents when the icon is pressed.

      Returns an optional ActionListener to be notified when this decoration is clicked.

      Returns whether this decoration is visible.

    • Method Detail

      • getIcon

        public abstract javax.swing.Icon getIcon(javax.swing.JTree tree,
                                         java.lang.Object value,
                                         boolean selected,
                                         boolean expanded,
                                         boolean leaf,
                                         int row,
                                         boolean isRollover,
                                         boolean isPressed)
        Returns the icon this decoration should currently render.

        It is assumed this icon will not change dimensions.

        Parameters:
        tree - the tree being rendered
        value - the tree node being rendered
        selected - whether the tree node is selected
        expanded - whether the tree node is expanded
        leaf - whether the tree node is a leaf node
        row - the row index of the tree node
        isRollover - whether the mouse is hovering over this decoration
        isPressed - whether the mouse is pressed to arm this icon, similar to how buttons are armed.
        Returns:
        the icon this decoration should currently render.

      • isVisible

        public abstract boolean isVisible(javax.swing.JTree tree,
                                  java.lang.Object value,
                                  boolean selected,
                                  boolean expanded,
                                  boolean leaf,
                                  int row,
                                  boolean hasFocus)
        Returns whether this decoration is visible.
        Parameters:
        tree - the tree being rendered
        value - the tree node being rendered
        selected - whether the tree node is selected
        expanded - whether the tree node is expanded
        leaf - whether the tree node is a leaf node
        row - the row index of the tree node
        Returns:
        whether this decoration is visible.

      • getActionListener

        public abstract java.awt.event.ActionListener getActionListener(javax.swing.JTree tree,
                                                                java.lang.Object value,
                                                                boolean selected,
                                                                boolean expanded,
                                                                boolean leaf,
                                                                int row,
                                                                boolean hasFocus)
        Returns an optional ActionListener to be notified when this decoration is clicked. If this returns null then no ActionEvent will be issued when this decoration is clicked.
        Parameters:
        tree - the tree being rendered
        value - the tree node being rendered
        selected - whether the tree node is selected
        expanded - whether the tree node is expanded
        leaf - whether the tree node is a leaf node
        row - the row index of the tree node
        Returns:
        an optional ActionListener to be notified when this decoration is clicked.
